name: Reality in Motion
description:
The fast pace of technological development drag modern humans into schizophrenic's condition. The mood swing affected by content's consumption, never ending learn and development of the new technology, The blurriness of reality and hyperreality, fear of missing out, the embodiment of gadgets, the interflow of human and robot--are some pattern of our era. I tried to picture those phenomenon to this piece both technically and in imagery. 

Oil Digital Painting 
4879 x 7317 Px PNG
